article:
Hi Zhou Ling,
   How are you? I haven't heard from you for weeks. Is everything ok with you?
   Do you  _  go to the gym
every day? I used to go to the  _  three time a week, but I
don't
  work out  any more. I know another way to  _  slim. Looking good is important to women, isn't it
?
  _  young women want a slim figure these days,  _  here in Canada. I'm trying to lose
weight because I'm so ashamed of my body.  _  I'm
preparing to act in a new TV show, I'm
taking weight-loss pills called Fat-Less, which are quite  _  with young women here. I hope to
lose at least 10 kilograms.
   I take two pills a day and don't need to exercise.
   The pills really  _  ! I'm becoming
slimmer and slimmer. I've lost 7 kilograms in the last
two months. However, sometimes I don't feel so energetic. My mother, who you met last year, 
keeps telling me not to take  _  because they are
dangerous. She says health is the most
important thing, and I agree, but then I look so slim at the moment.
